Rhythmyx 6 Public API

Package com.percussion.services.publisher

Interface Summary
IPSContentList Represents a content list from the database.
IPSContentListGenerator A generator creates a candidate list of content guids to be published.
IPSDeliveryType A delivery location has the representation for a single publisher plugin.
IPSEdition An edition is a collection of content lists and tasks for a site that embodies a unit of publishing work.
IPSEditionContentList  
IPSEditionTaskDef The Edition Task Definition.
IPSEditionTaskLog This represents a single running of a single edition task.
IPSPubItemStatus Each published item is recorded in the database.
IPSPublisher Represents a publisher from the database.
IPSPublisherService Service to do CRUD operations on content lists and run content lists.s
IPSPublisherServiceErrors Publisher service error codes
IPSPubStatus Each publishing job that runs has a status record.
IPSSiteItem A site item represents the state of a single published item to a site.
IPSTemplateExpander A template expander takes a content guid and returns zero or more template guids to use for publishing (or any other purpose).
 

Class Summary
PSPublisherServiceLocator Content list service locator
 

Enum Summary
IPSContentList.Type The type of content list, which dictates how it will be processed.
IPSEdition.Priority Priorities of the Edition.
IPSPubStatus.EndingState The ending state of a publishing job.
IPSSiteItem.Operation The operation that was performed on the item
IPSSiteItem.Status The status of the operation, note that the order here must match the above order for operation so that the value for publish and success match, and unpublish and failure match.
 

Exception Summary
PSPublisherException Exception thrown by the publisher service
